call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Community Chat - September 25th

decisions.decision: Created a GitHub repo to post receipts and chat logs from HTX exchange, asking the crypto community to post their own receipts of similar extortion
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Following HTX's demand for marketing fees to prevent delisting
decisions.quote: we created a GitHub repo where we posted the receipts as well as some chat logs of that and asked the community to, not just the Ergo community, but the crypto community to post their receipts

commitments.commitment: DevNet for sub-blocks will be ready for community joining in a few days
commitments.quote: Feel free to join maybe in a few days. Some issues to be fixed, but not so many

commitments.commitment: Will have ChainCash demo ready for use in different communities
commitments.quote: I think in a few weeks we will have demo to be used

commitments.commitment: Meeting with Telegram wallet developer tomorrow
commitments.quote: So tomorrow we'll meet the developer of Telegram wallet

commitments.commitment: Will publish a plan on spending the fundraising bounty
commitments.quote: And yeah, so we'll publish a plan on spanning this key

commitments.commitment: USC Stablecoin will start issuing first needed tokens this week
commitments.quote: USC Stablecoin, still planning deployment, will start issuing first needed tokens this week

commitments.commitment: Will start reaching journalists today for HTX exposure
commitments.quote: Yeah, I will start to reach journalists today. We need to get maximum exposure

commitments.commitment: Will provide feedback on infinite pitch deck today after coding session
commitments.quote: we'll provide some feedback today after coding session

open_questions.question: What is Hermes exactly and its specific functionality
open_questions.context: Mentioned in dev updates but unclear what it does

open_questions.question: Who will hold update keys and what rules for burning them for Dexy-based USD stablecoin
open_questions.context: Technical parts are ready but governance decisions remain

open_questions.question: Which pool to choose and how much liquidity to provide for BitGet listing strategy
open_questions.context: Need to decide on Ethereum or Binance Smart Chain LP for free exchange exposure

key_facts.fact: HTX demanded 30,000 for 14 days with no delisting and 100k to delay delisting
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Another project paid $500,000 for HTX listing and still got delisting notice
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: 7000 ERG raised in fundraising campaigns - 2k already available and 5k to be released in a few days
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: BitGet is probably number three globally after Binance and Bybit
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Cyberverse is down for the month doing massive upgrade with P2P combat
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: DeFi projects have total market cap of 20 to 25 billion USD with broken token economies
key_facts.speaker: kushti
